text: "Dreadlock Holiday" is a 1978 reggae song by British band 10cc. It is the leading single from their sixth studio album Bloody Tourists. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, New Zealand and Belgium, number 45 in Canada, number 44 in the United States, number 2 in both Ireland and Australia and number 7 in Norway. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Reggae rock songs Category:Pop songs Category:10cc songs
title: Dreadlock Holiday
